title: Sad day indeed.
body:
Our dear friend Sacky was perm banned from the forums today, his legacy will live on.
http://i.gyazo.com/29135ea42f93bea2eb814abb27237893.png

http://i.gyazo.com/c2537e3044593779c221b3fb8d613d40.png
So close to 1,000. I believed he could do it.

replies.body: he deserved it

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Yskc4pte,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-27T07:59:54.557+0000)
>
> he deserved it

He did not, how dare you disgrace his legacy.

Gone but not forgotten.
AMEN.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Yskc4pte,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-27T08:06:45.793+0000)
>
> *takes sackboys legacy and uses it as toilet paper*
> 
> Please remind me to never do that again. Ended up with more shit there than when I started.

First time you've ever wiped your bottom, grats.
i bet this is another one of he's accounts.. how did you even get this photo?

R.I.P ~~Sack Boy~~ Piece of garbage
_Here lies a troller of the internet
you will be forgotten
no one will care that you are gone
and everyone will be rejoice in your ban.
Thankyou to riot for this day to remember,
it will be celebrated for years to come
the day ~~sack boy~~ trash can was put to rest._
Not as good as Molendo's Eulogy

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Yskc4pte,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-27T08:13:48.774+0000)
>
> Probs right, his history only has 2 posts, both about Sackboy being banned.

I love Sacky, I do everything to please him.
Call me his right hand.
so you're his girlfriend?
he could be left handed?

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Yskc4pte,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-04-27T08:02:47.075+0000)
>
> He did not, how dare you disgrace his legacy.
> 
> Gone but not forgotten.

he will be in my brain cause i have him and you blacklisted now
Thats the scarey part...it will be back....

Lel took time ayy

whoops still in old GD mode
Good job Riot.
I think im close to joining u m8 rito are cheeki lads

Guess I missed out the action.
Good.
simple yet effective.
